content.question: Which of the following developments in nineteenth-century Brazil was most likely a product of the experiences of elite Brazilians, as described in the second paragraph?

choices.label: The relocation of the Portuguese monarchâ€™s court to Brazil

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
